name: th-coke-qa
description: This repo is managed by QA team for Coke-Playwright Automation

scripts.test:priority: npx playwright test tests/specs/adminInviteUser.spec.ts && npx playwright test tests/specs/createAccount.spec.ts && npx playwright test $(find tests/specs -type f -name '*.spec.ts' | grep -v 'adminInviteUser.spec.ts' | grep -v 'createAccount.spec.ts')
